meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>dragon</kanji> <kanji>scroll</kanji> is a dragon that's shaped kind of like a scroll, spinning around. This is a <vocabulary>tornado</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi readings of the kanji. For 竜 just think about how it's a <reading>stand</reading>ing (立つ) dragon, because it would have to be if it's a <vocabulary>tornado</vocabulary>. Your まき reading comes from 巻く, but the kana is pushed into the kanji.
